025
026package org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.builders;
027
028import static org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.util.VisibleMemberTable.Kind.*;
029
030import java.util.*;
031
032import javax.lang.model.element.Element;
033import javax.lang.model.element.TypeElement;
034
035import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.AnnotationTypeMemberWriter;
036import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.BaseOptions;
037import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.Content;
038import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.DocletException;
039
040/**
041 * Builds documentation for required annotation type members.
042 */
043public class AnnotationTypeMemberBuilder extends AbstractMemberBuilder {
044
045    /**
046     * The writer to output the member documentation.
047     */
048    protected AnnotationTypeMemberWriter writer;
049
050    /**
051     * The list of members being documented.
052     */
053    protected List<Element> members;
054
055    /**
056     * The index of the current member that is being documented at this point
057     * in time.
058     */
059    protected Element currentMember;
060
061    /**
062     * Construct a new AnnotationTypeRequiredMemberBuilder.
063     *
064     * @param context  the build context.
065     * @param typeElement the class whose members are being documented.
066     * @param writer the doclet specific writer.
067     */
068    protected AnnotationTypeMemberBuilder(Context context,
069            TypeElement typeElement,
070            AnnotationTypeMemberWriter writer) {
071        super(context, typeElement);
072        this.writer = Objects.requireNonNull(writer);
073        // In contrast to the annotation interface member summaries the details
074        // generated
075        // by this builder share a single list for both required and optional
076        // members.
077        this.members = getVisibleMembers(ANNOTATION_TYPE_MEMBER);
078    }
079
080    /**
081     * Construct a new AnnotationTypeMemberBuilder.
082     *
083     * @param context  the build context.
084     * @param typeElement the class whose members are being documented.
085     * @param writer the doclet specific writer.
086     * @return an instance of this object
087     */
088    public static AnnotationTypeMemberBuilder getInstance(
089            Context context, TypeElement typeElement,
090            AnnotationTypeMemberWriter writer) {
091        return new AnnotationTypeMemberBuilder(context, typeElement,
092            writer);
093    }
094
095    /**
096     * Returns whether or not there are members to document.
097     * @return whether or not there are members to document
098     */
099    @Override
100    public boolean hasMembersToDocument() {
101        return !members.isEmpty();
102    }
103
104    @Override
105    public void build(Content target) throws DocletException {
106        buildAnnotationTypeMember(target);
107    }
108
109    /**
110     * Build the member documentation.
111     *
112     * @param target the content to which the documentation will be added
113     * @throws DocletException if an error occurs
114     */
115    protected void buildAnnotationTypeMember(Content target)
116            throws DocletException {
117        if (hasMembersToDocument()) {
118            writer.addAnnotationDetailsMarker(target);
119            Content annotationDetailsHeader
120                = writer.getAnnotationDetailsHeader();
121            Content memberList = writer.getMemberList();
122
123            for (Element member : members) {
124                currentMember = member;
125                Content annotationContent
126                    = writer.getAnnotationHeaderContent(currentMember);
127
128                buildAnnotationTypeMemberChildren(annotationContent);
129
130                memberList.add(writer.getMemberListItem(annotationContent));
131            }
132            Content annotationDetails = writer
133                .getAnnotationDetails(annotationDetailsHeader, memberList);
134            target.add(annotationDetails);
135        }
136    }
137
138    protected void
139            buildAnnotationTypeMemberChildren(Content annotationContent) {
140        buildSignature(annotationContent);
141        buildDeprecationInfo(annotationContent);
142        buildPreviewInfo(annotationContent);
143        buildMemberComments(annotationContent);
144        buildTagInfo(annotationContent);
145        buildDefaultValueInfo(annotationContent);
146    }
147
148    /**
149     * Build the signature.
150     *
151     * @param target the content to which the documentation will be added
152     */
153    protected void buildSignature(Content target) {
154        target.add(writer.getSignature(currentMember));
155    }
156
157    /**
158     * Build the deprecation information.
159     *
160     * @param annotationContent the content to which the documentation will be added
161     */
162    protected void buildDeprecationInfo(Content annotationContent) {
163        writer.addDeprecated(currentMember, annotationContent);
164    }
165
166    /**
167     * Build the preview information.
168     *
169     * @param annotationContent the content to which the documentation will be added
170     */
171    protected void buildPreviewInfo(Content annotationContent) {
172        writer.addPreview(currentMember, annotationContent);
173    }
174
175    /**
176     * Build the comments for the member.  Do nothing if
177     * {@link BaseOptions#noComment()} is set to true.
178     *
179     * @param annotationContent the content to which the documentation will be added
180     */
181    protected void buildMemberComments(Content annotationContent) {
182        if (!options.noComment()) {
183            writer.addComments(currentMember, annotationContent);
184        }
185    }
186
187    /**
188     * Build the tag information.
189     *
190     * @param annotationContent the content to which the documentation will be added
191     */
192    protected void buildTagInfo(Content annotationContent) {
193        writer.addTags(currentMember, annotationContent);
194    }
195
196    /**
197     * Build the default value for this optional member.
198     *
199     * @param annotationContent the content to which the documentation will be added
200     */
201    protected void buildDefaultValueInfo(Content annotationContent) {
202        writer.addDefaultValueInfo(currentMember, annotationContent);
203    }
204
205    /**
206     * Return the annotation type required member writer for this builder.
207     *
208     * @return the annotation type required member constant writer for this
209     * builder.
210     */
211    public AnnotationTypeMemberWriter getWriter() {
212        return writer;
213    }
214}
